sub_title: CULTURAL Anthropologist 🌎 DIVERSITY Coach I Trainer & Consultant 🎇 TALENT expert  I SOCIAL Worker I project MANAGEMENT 🏜️ Founder KORUVAAN 🌎 Refugees I Family & Inclusion  🍀 Nature Art Dance, Movement 🎭  Theatre
summary:
De basis voor een gelukkig leven ligt in jezelf, niet in de omstandigheden of de plek waar je jezelf begeeft. Dat voel ik al mijn hele leven.

Wil jij vanuit jouw veelzijdigheid een stevige basis bouwen in de wereld? Of jezelf thuis voelen waar dan ook? Met jouw unieke KernTalenten-programma realiseren we jouw doelen en diepste dromen. 

Als gecertificeerd KernTalentenanalist hoop ik dat iedereen leeft vanuit passie. Mijn eigen KernTalenten assessment heeft mij een zeer genuanceerd beeld gegeven van hoe alle facetten in mij, mijn talenten en gedrevenheid met elkaar verweven zijn. Werkelijk mijn hoofd, hart en handen verbinden en empathisch meevoelen gaan samen met scherpe analyse waarmee ik  tot praktische en creatieve oplossingen kom voor mens en omgeving.

Bij de Koruvaan werk ik aan levenskunst. Ik combineer persoonlijkheidsanalyse met creatieve ontmoetingen & coaching voor moeders en jonge mensen overal vandaan.

awards.title: Lecturer at Annual Day of Vrouwen voor Vrede (Women for Peace)
awards.description: I had the honor to give a lecture about the role of young girls of the Foundation Marijn, who had the courage to speak about taboos in their society to break the cycle of violence.
awards.issuer: Peace movements give lectures about the role of women in non violent situations

awards.title: First Prize Women's Power to Stop War Essay Competitions 'We can do it! No against all forms of violence!'
awards.description: Certificate of Achievement was rewarded by Research Professor Cynthia Enloe best known for her work on gender and militarism and for her contributions to the field of feminist international relations
awards.issuer: In honor of the centenary of Women's International League of Peace and Freedom

awards.title: Lecturer at the conference of The European Society For The Study Of Symbolic Interaction: "Conflict, cooperation and Transformation in Everyday Life"Do you know who we are?
awards.description: I had the honor of giving a lecture about the impact of dialogue between Jewish and Palestinians in Israel and the Palestinian Territory on their perception of home & belonging and the way national narratives play a role in their daily lives. The Society for the Study of Symbolic Interaction (SSSI) invited me to be part of their conference. SSSI is an international professional organization of scholars interested in the study of a wide range of social issues with an emphasis on identity, everyday practice, and language.

profile_positions.description:
Wil jij jouw blauwdruk met jouw KernTalenten in beeld, zodat jij jouw mooiste leven kunt leiden? Bij de Koruvaan verwelkom ik jongeren, studenten en vrouwen uit alle windstreken, die aan de slag willen met hun passies binnen hun droomstudie of werkveld. Met de KernTalentenmethode analyseer ik jou. Samen ontdekken we wie jij bent, welke talenten je hebt en waar je energie van krijgt. 

Would you like to have a blueprint of your CoreTalents, so you can live a wonderful life? At the Koruvaan I welcome youth, students and women that would like to find a study or job according to their passions. By using The CoreTalentsmethod I can analyse your personality. Together we discover who you are, what kind of talents you have and what gives you energy. 

www.koruvaan.com
profile_positions.title: Founder Koruvaan

profile_positions.description:
Talentmanagement and coaching of the voluntary and student social workers who support refugees to establish a new home in the Netherlands. 
Excellent in assessing opportunities such as talents, skills and social network for sucessfull integration
With special attention to gender roles of parents and youth within the family system and life phase transition bridging values in the homeland and the new society.  
Sharing expertise with collaboration partners, companies, social services and educational institutions
Coordination of the Participation Statement Trajectory (PVT) about the values freedom, equality, participation and solidarity specified in the Dutch law and intertwined in society.
profile_positions.title: Teamleader

profile_positions.description: We are working towards a form of Hybrid guidance for asylum seekers and refugees in which the good of personal one-on-one guidance and group guidance is preserved, supported by online tools and other digital forms of coaching and contact.
profile_positions.title: Regional Project Manager Hybrid Support

profile_positions.description:
Organizing festive event about dreams and connections for the participants with different migration backgrounds, language coaches and stakeholders
Project administration and purchasing educative material
profile_positions.title: Project Officer Language in motion (Taal in Beweging)

profile_positions.description: Empowerment and implementing the Individual Support Plan based on the wishes and needs of adolescents and adults with intellectual disabilities in their homesituation
profile_positions.title: Social worker  of adults with intellectual disabilities

profile_positions.description:
Project coordination and implementation of a languageproject focused on integration, participation and education
Public Relations and recruitment of volunteers and participants of the integration program
Assessing the specific needs of language development and self-reliance of the participants
Training and guiding a team of volunteers and take care of their professional development
Coaching of refugees
Writing evaluation reports and project administration  about the quality and quantity of work 
Maintaining contacts with cooperating agencies and the municipality
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Taalcoach (Language Coach)

profile_positions.description:
Day to day planning of the creative activities for people with intellectual disabilities
Coordinating and implementing different projects: the hobbyclub, Free Style Band, the theater group and the 'Friendship Circle'; organizing a monthly excursion
Instructing and supervising the team of volunteers

company.name: Theatergroup Gelukzoekers of Syria and the Netherlands

volunteer_experiences.description:
During the period of October 2016 untill Januari 2017 I was participating in the theater workshop series of the Gelukzoekers led by theater maker Ihab Bakir, theater director Monika Kowalewska and event organizer Mazen Eltess. 'De Gelukzoekers'(Fortune hunters) have been like a flock of birds  during these twelve weeks. In the presentation you see what this process has yielded and you will see loving portraits of  all the participants.
Theater presentations:
Bij Katrien: 14 januari 2017 
Stormfestival in theater de Nieuwe Vorst Tilburg: maart 2017
Theaterfestival Boulevard in 's-Hertogenbosch: 3 augustus 2017

Read more here: http://www.koruvaan.com/gelukzoekers-2/

volunteer_experiences.role: Coach of a young woman with a refugee background
volunteer_experiences.description:
Coaching a young woman with a refugee background participating in the empowerment project Ondernemen in je eigen toekomst (Be a entrepreneur in your own future)
The objective of New Dutch Connection is to connect migrants, refugees and Dutch people and to support the asylumseeker or undocumented youth to economic self-reliance, no matter where their future will be

Giving individual support in order to develop the reading skills and writing skills of a six year old girl
